channel.title: Tutorials on Flowbased Polymer
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorials on Flowbased Polymer

item.description: Welcome to the tutorial! We hope you have read the Getting Started Site. In this tutorial we build an element that witch can be showed and hideed. First install FBP bower install flowbased-polymer --save Generate a polymer element mkdir fbp-tutorial cd fbp-tutorial polymer init Select polymer-2-element and run it. After this install flowbased polymer bower install flowbased-polymer --save Open the project in you favourite editor. Open the fbp-tutorial.
